title: Solar Cell Defect Detection
synopsis: Workflow package for an ML defect detection pipeline. Manages splitting, preprocessing and recomposition of electroluminescent images from the solar panel manufacturing process
notes: Vectorization and multi-threading accelerates processing of high-resolution image matrices
A bespoke registration module exploits medical imaging techniques to accurately align low-information, sparsely featured cell images
A sequence of non-linear convolutions exposes otherwise hidden defects (e.g. hairline cracks)
Base Image class spun off into bindings for simplified and Pythonic image processing pipelines - ImGravy

feedback.text: [Gravy] managed to solve problems that others couldn't. Proactive, he gets what to do quickly, overall a pleasure to work with [Gravy], highly recommended.
